document_data.mainbody:
The deathstalker mantle was an enchanted cloak worn by the deathstalkers of Bhaal in the 15 century DR.
The cloaks magic turned the wearer invisible after a kill. This power was activated automatically, once per six seconds, and the invisibility lasted for 12 seconds.
*Dark Urge, a Bhaalspawn of the late 15 century DR. The mantle was entrusted to Sceleritas Fel, the Dark Urges attendant in 1492 DR.
